testcase.name: It should show today's menu on customer dashboard
It should add meal to cart if meal's add button is clicked
It should navigate to cartpage and place order
It should not remove meal from cart if delete is clicked but not confirmed
It should remove meal from cart if delete is clicked and confirmed
It should navigate to orderpage and show order details when order info button is clicked
It should show edit order modal and update order when order edit button is clicked
It should cancel order if delete order button is clicked and confirmed
